titleStmt.title: The olde fayth of greate Brittaygne, and the newe learnynge of Inglande wherunto is added a symple instruction, concernynge the Kinges Maiesties procedinges in the co[m]munyon. Compyled by R.V.
titleStmt.author: R. V., fl. 1549.

titleStmt.title: The olde fayth of greate Brittaygne, and the newe learnynge of Inglande wherunto is added a symple instruction, concernynge the Kinges Maiesties procedinges in the co[m]munyon. Compyled by R.V.
titleStmt.author: R. V., fl. 1549.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Anthony Scoloker. dwellynge in the Sauoy rentes wythoute Temple-barre. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendu[m] solum,

notesStmt.note: "A simple instruction concernynge the Kinges maiesties procedinges in the communion" has separate divisional title; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
